content.html: I can admit when I'm wrong and I was wrong about @elonmusk. No one was more skeptical than I - but his decisions this week have shown he really *can* put a social network on the path to unprecedented success. Specifically Mastodon.
content.value:
I can admit when I'm wrong and I was wrong about @elonmusk.

No one was more skeptical than I - but his decisions this week have shown he really *can* put a social network on the path to unprecedented success.

Specifically Mastodon.
